title: should be no more kinship and XP potions?
body: All frens should be able to compete and showing their hard work doesn't matter of how much they can afford? kindship should only rise as a result of treating your aavagotchi, not by buying potions. The same with XP we agreed that XP increased by voting and the countrubition in the forum. having XP potions, means even most active frens will miss winning, and therefore, is killing the competition.
choices: Agree and remove all from bazzar
author: 0x197C8D4961b0022045df25e5E05234f4fA049BB1
